text: Dr. Xin Yuan and Dr. Weikuan Yu Awarded FSU CS Professorships | Dr. Xin Yuan and Dr. Weikuan Yu Awarded FSU CS Professorships Dr. Xin Yuan has been awarded the Harris Professorship that is sponsored by the L3Harris Corporation. Dr. Weikuan Yu has been awarded the Mainline Information Systems Professorship sponsored by Mainline Information Systems. Both professorships have three-year terms.
